charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2) - Felon in Possession of Firearm(4)

charges.charge_disposition: committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of FORTY-EIGHT (48) MONTHS, with credit for time served. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of THIRTY-SIX (36) MONTHS. Special Assessment: $100; Fine: Waived
